title: Pixel 2 Microphone not working for Video and Voicemessages??
content:
Hello!
Since some time I noticed that my phone doesn't record audio in Videos and for any kind of Voicemessage (Instagram, telegram, WhatsApp)
Calls on both WhatsApp and regulars phone service work tho as well as a separate voice recording app I have, Wich also gives me a working audio file!
That is so weird and annoying to me...
Does anyone have an idea?
Thank u!
